nodes.text: A male individual served as a Coruscant Security Force officer on the planet Coruscant. During Order 66, which condemned all Jedi as traitors to the Galactic Republic, the individual was patrolling in a CSF assault ship, along with his akk dog, Jossie, the assault ship's pilot, Vil, and Republic Commandos Darman and Niner. Upon hearing that the CSF's compliance order for Jedi had been rescinded and they had tried to stage a coup, the individual reacted with reserved disgust towards the Jedi, stating that he believed the fire at the Jedi Temple was set by the Jedi themselves, trying to conceal evidence of their treason.
The individual appeared in Order 66: A Republic Commando Novel, written by Karen Traviss and published on September 16, 2008.
